title:
Update documentation, Rmarkdown files and raw data; check, test,
build and reinstall the running package locally. — update_package
text: .update_data Update raw data .update_readme Update README file .update_rmd Build Rmarkdown files inside package .update_site Build pkgdown website .check Check package .unit_test Execute testthat tests
